alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Gadsden and central Leon Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 358 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Midway, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Florida State University, Midway, Havana, Florida A and M, Tallahassee Community College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Lake Bradford, Macon Community Park, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Scotland, Walker Ford Community Center, Griffin Heights, Fred George Park, Lake Ella, Callen Neighborhood, Tallahassee Regional A/P, State Capital Complex, Governors Square Mall and Forest Meadows Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
